name: Dumb Jumping
description:
An old-fashioned pixel jumping game, try it on to see if you can zigzag.

Simple and easy, tap to make turns or to jump.

The dumbest jumping ever? Yes it is if you remember to zigzag.
The most addictive jumping ever? Yes it is if you forget to zigzag.

FEATURES:

attacks to jump away from
power-ups to pick up
platforms to jump on
stairs to climb up
zig zag turns to make

CAUTIONS:

Don't forget to ZigZag!
